name: Sigma
ability: You cannot die by execution.

name: Looksmaxxer
ability: Once per day, the person who nominates you becomes sober and healthy.

otherNightReminder: If 3 days have passed, Hawk Tuah Girl dies.
name: Hawk Tuah Girl
ability: After the 3rd day, you die.

firstNightReminder: The Fanum Taxer shows a 'no' head signal, or chooses a player: if evil, Fanum Taxer dies. Otherwise, gain their ability.
otherNightReminder: The Fanum Taxer shows a 'no' head signal, or chooses a player: if evil, Fanum Taxer dies. Otherwise, gain their ability.
name: Fanum Taxer
ability: Once per game, choose a player at night. You gain their ability. If evil, you die.

name: Mogger
ability: Once per game, publically choose a dead player. They can nominate and vote normally.

name: Costco Guy
ability: Each day, publically choose a player. They cannot die. Cannot choose yourself.

name: Mewer
ability: Each day, you must publically "mew". If your mewing streak ends, you die. Mewing prevents you from dying at night.

name: Ohioan
ability: You start knowing a random role in play.

name: Lightskin
ability: Pick a player first night*. They cannot be poisoned

name: Streamer
ability: Once per game, publicly choose a player. Everybody learns their role.

name: Simp
ability: You start knowing if a random townsfolk is good.

firstNightReminder: The Redditor points to a player.
otherNightReminder: The Redditor points to a player.
name: Redditor
ability: Each night, pick a player. Their vote counts as a downvote [negatively].

firstNightReminder: Wake Edgar and show thumbs up or thumbs down.
otherNightReminder: Wake Edgar and show thumbs up or thumbs down.
name: Edgar
ability: Each night, you learn a player's alignment in a clockwise direction.

name: Racist
ability: If there are more outsiders [+travelers] than townsfolk, you become evil.

name: Gooner
ability: Each night, the 1st player to choose you with their ability is drunk until dusk. You become their alignment.

firstNightReminder: If a townsfolk picked the Furry tonight: replace that player's character token with a Furry token. Show that player YOU ARE and the Furry token.
otherNightReminder: If a townsfolk picked the Furry tonight: replace that player's character token with a Furry token. Show that player YOU ARE and the Furry token.
name: Furry
ability: If a townsfolk picks you at night, they become a furry too. If one furry dies, the rest do too.

firstNightReminder: If 7 or more players: Show THIS IS THE DEMON token. Point to the "Demon". Show THESE ARE YOUR MINIONS token. Point to "Minions". Put the Delulu to sleep..
otherNightReminder: Do whatever is needed to simulate the minion.
name: Delulu
ability: You think you are a minion. You don't know that you are delulu.

name: Skibidi Toilet
ability: Your townsfolk neighbors are poisoned until you die.

otherNightReminder: The Rizzler either shows a 'no' head signal, or points to two players.
name: Rizzler
ability: Once per game*, choose 2 players. Their abilities are swapped.

otherNightReminder: The Grimace picks a player to poison. If that player is already poisoned, they die.
name: Grimace
ability: Each night*, choose a palyer. They are poisoned. If already poisoned, they die.

otherNightReminder: The Joker picks a player. If that player wakes, ask the Joker what to tell them if they learn any information.
name: Joker
ability: Each night*, choose a player. You get to choose what information to give them.

name: Imposter
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. You register as good.

otherNightReminder: The Thick of It chooses a number of players equal to the number of nominations that occurred today. Those players die.
name: Thick of It
ability: Each time someone is nominated, you gain a kill that night. If nobody is nominated, you cannot kill.

otherNightReminder: If it is an even-numbered night: the Baby Gronk chooses a player: they die.
name: Baby Gronk
ability: Every other night*, Choose a player, they die. You add 2 minions in play.
